name: 3.31.0 Changed in Bamboo, Jira, Insight, Confluence
body:
Hi! 

In that release we made a lot of changes. 
Skipped 3.30.0 as it was failed upload on PYPI.

You can follow the next PRs.


## What's Changed
* Bug/fix assign issue by @kkjorsvik in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/728
* Switch from SHA1 to SHA2 by @tuxmaster5000 in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1049
* Confluence update or create method by @gonchik in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1050
* [Bamboo] New Bamboo REST API documentation URL by @infame-io in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1052
* Confluence: update_page method by @CermitDFrog in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1051
* Insight for jira module by @gonchik in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/973
* Move API from experimental to normal url (#960) by @julien-lecomte in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1053
* Pin to importlib-metadata==4.13.0, because it's not supported in Python3.7 - Tests are failing by @martynbristow in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1058
* Fix print typo in code block example in README by @MatthewJohn in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1066
* Jira: Add functionality to get comments on an issue by @martynbristow in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1064
* Revert change: `pprint` to `print` ... `pprint`  by @martynbristow in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1067
* [confluence] Fix def get_page_as_pdf When using Confluence Cloud(#1057) by @rootsj in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1061
* Fix bitbucket cloud commits #1071 by @sreway in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1072
* Add missing advanced mode to request method by @RoelantDL in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1068
* Resolve Failing Tests: Correction to adanced_usage=True by @martynbristow in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1074
* Update checkout and codecov action by @offa in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1075
* Replace deprecatd tempfile.mktemp() calls by @offa in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1076

## New Contributors
* @kkjorsvik made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/728
* @CermitDFrog made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1051
* @julien-lecomte made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1053
* @MatthewJohn made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1066
* @rootsj made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1061
* @sreway made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1072
* @RoelantDL made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1068

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/compare/3.28.1...3.31.0

name: 3.28.1 Bitbucket Cloud request changes
body:
## What's Changed
* Bitbucket Cloud: allow to access repositories directly by @flichtenheld in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/923
* Fix AttributeError: 'Response' object has no attribute 'get' by @fullonic in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1046

## New Contributors
* @fullonic made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1046

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/compare/3.28.0...3.28.1

name: 3.28.0 New module and adjustments
body:
Hi! 
Cloud admin module
BB module adjustments

Cheers,
GT

## What's Changed
* [Jira] Fix the parameter of remove_user_from_group from username to account id  by @YugoHino in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1018
* Jira : add account_id to the parameters of add_user_to_group for Jira Cloud  by @YugoHino in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1028
* [Confluence] Amending Confluence documentation by @infame-io in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1035
* [Confluence] Logging page content as info by @infame-io in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1036
* [Bamboo] Support for elastic bamboo by @infame-io in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1034
* Add new module Cloud Admin by @YugoHino in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1033
* Bitbucket Cloud: Add support for commit/commits endpoint by @flichtenheld in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/924
* [BlackTest] Reformatting file by @infame-io in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1037
* Add new createmeta functions to comply with Jira 9 API by @Ry-DS in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1031
* Run Atlassian SDK in docker by @infame-io in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1038
* [Jira] Add function get_user_groups by @YugoHino in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1041
* Jira: Add ability to add icons to issue remote links by @grahamalama in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1040
* [Bitbucket Cloud] Add avatar property to user object by @RobinDeNeef in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/761

## New Contributors
* @YugoHino made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1018
* @infame-io made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1035
* @grahamalama made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/1040
* @RobinDeNeef made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/761

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/compare/3.26.0...3.28.0

body:
Hi! 

In this release:

Cheers,
Gonchik Tsymzhitov

name: Jira plugin license method and rest client fix errors
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix error response without 'errors' field by @co-stig in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/972
* Method for getting info about license object by @DmitriyStruzhkin in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/942

## New Contributors
* @co-stig made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/972
* @DmitriyStruzhkin made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/942

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/compare/3.24.0...3.25.0

## What's Changed
* Add dedicated method for the fetching all values by @gonchik in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/945
* DOC : correct URL for black tool in CONTRIBUTING.rst by @Turiok in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/946
* [Confluence] page_exists method without error log by @Starkandco in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/949
* [Jira] added simple wrapper by @gonchik in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/952
* [Bitbucket] Update parameter name to repository_slug by @MSumulong in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/959
* [Jira] updated get_file_list method for folder support by @jaromieee in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/955
* [Jira] Fix user properties endpoints (use account id) by @janoskut in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/943
* [Jira] Insight for jira module by @0xW1sKy in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/970
* [SD] request_comments start,limit,public,internal by @H9lDJbyZ in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/974
* [Jira] Fix update_version PUT url by @damon-dischler in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/978
* [Jira] Add multiple methods by @maeRamadan in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/977
* [SD] Change logging level by @BenjaminH-Sogeti in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/968

## New Contributors
* @Turiok made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/946
* @Starkandco made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/949
* @MSumulong made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/959
* @jaromieee made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/955
* @janoskut made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/943
* @H9lDJbyZ made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/974
* @damon-dischler made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/978
* @maeRamadan made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/977
* @BenjaminH-Sogeti made their first contribution in https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/pull/968

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atlassian-api/atlassian-python-api/compare/3.20.0...3.24.0
